metadata.title: CVE-2020-28644 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The CSRF (Cross Site Request Forgery) token check was improperlyimplemented on cookie authenticated requests against some ocs APIendpoints. This affects ownCloud/core version < 10.6.

criterions.comment: owncloud: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
